name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
summary: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe.
description:
You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe. The Strike deals two extra weapon damage dice, and you can convert all the physical damage from the attack into positive damage.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
